description: Ayuda NGO, founded in 2013 by a passionate group of students, embarked on a mission to create a positive impact in the world. With a dedicated team and diverse projects, Ayuda has gained recognition for their efforts in tackling issues such as sexual violence, supporting differently-abled organizations, and raising awareness about drug abuse. Their journey is marked by diligence, team spirit, and a commitment to being the change they want to see.

roles.work: I skillfully led and coordinated a diverse team of 600 members, overseeing the effective management of 7 separate domains within the organization. Through my leadership, we successfully organized and executed over 10 impactful events, while also mentoring and training a group of 10 individuals to excel in leadership roles.

I was responsible for the smooth functioning of the organization, and was in charge of the recruitment and training of 450 members. I also led the podcast domain with tightly knitt team of 15 people, and was responsible for the overseeing of outreach domain.
I was a part of the outreach domain. I used to teach kids of orphanages and involved in the founding stages of the podcast domain - The Social Muse.

description: Cosmos, formerly known as Cosmos IIT Madras BSc - Technical Club of Saranda, is the vibrant technical society of IIT Madras BS. Comprising a dedicated community of tech enthusiasts, we foster a passion for continuous learning and knowledge-sharing. Through a range of meticulously organized events and workshops, we empower students to expand their skills and flourish, fostering a culture of collective growth and collaboration.

roles.work: I skillfully led and coordinated a diverse team of 150 members, overseeing the effective management of 3 separate domains within the organization. Through my leadership, we successfully organized and executed over 5 impactful events, while also mentoring and training a group of 5 individuals to excel in leadership roles.
